subsc: Telecommunications,Central government administration,General energy sector,General transportation sector,Banking

abstracts.cdata!:
The project objective is to assist the
            government in the preparation and implementation of its
            privatization program and related sectoral policy, legal and
            regulatory reforms.  The project will finance:  (a)
            fixed-term staff and office support for the Commission for
            Promotion of Private Investment technical secretariat and
            special privatization committees; (b) domestic and
            international information and promotional campaigns for
            Peru's privatization program, and information programs
            to assist laid off State-owned enterprise workers; and (c)
            consulting services to assist with the preparation and
            implementation of privatization and related
            policy/regulatory reforms in mining, hydrocarbons,
            telecommunications, power, fisheries, air/urban transport,
            industry, water, and banking.  These consulting services
            will involve:  (i) the preparation of new sectoral
            laws/regulations; (ii) financial, labor, legal and
            environmental audits; (iii) valuations; and (iv) the
            preparation of sales documentation.
